resources.string: Can not find \"su\" binary file.\nYou have not root permission.\n

All user data will be lost.
After Unlock Bootloader,you must format "Data" Partition.
In Flyme recovery press Vol+ 5 times and then Vol- 5 times.
If you have TWRP,
go to "Wipe" and press 
"Format Data"

All user data will be lost.
After Lock Bootloader,you must format "Data" Partition and 
flash Flyme firmware.
Flyme Recovery will be restored.
In Flyme recovery 
press Vol+ 5 times 
and then Vol- 5 times
 for format "Data" .
